notes: SALDO (Swedish Associative Thesaurus version 2) is an extensive lexicon resource for modern Swedish written language created for the purpose of language technology research and for the development of language technology applications. SALDO may be viewed as a basic lexical resouce for a Swedish BLARK. SALDO builds on Swedish Associative Thesaurus, a semantic lexicon for Swedish.
title: SALDO
